text: caramelized zaitan in coconut juice is a
simple vegetarian dish that you can put
up in just 15 minutes but it goes so
good with rice that you will keep making
over and over again
you will need about four pieces of
zaitan or wheat gluten 300 ml of coconut
juice some sugar pepper vegan stock
powder soy sauce vietnamese mint and
leek firstly pat the wig gluten dry and
pan fry until golden brown on raw size
remove the zaitan keep the oil in the
pan and sprinkle a tablespoon of sugar
over the base cook on low until the
sugar melts and get caramelized then add
a tablespoon of mince leek the white
part only and saute until fragrant then
add the fried zaitan and flip to coat
each piece with the caramel then add
coconut juice 2 tablespoons of soy sauce
and some stock powder to taste lower the
heat and simmer until the sauce is
thickened occasionally flip the zaitan
to fully coated with the sauce serve
with a sprinkle of black pepper or
sesame and some chopped vietnamese mint
the zaitan absorbs all the amazing
flavors of the coconut juice and
seasonings become so tasty and go so
good with hot steamed rice give it a try
and you get what i mean thank you for
watching and i will see you next time
bye
[Music]
you
